sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Form, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export const Notification = () => { const [showA, setShowA] = useState(true); const [showB, setShowB] = useState(true); const toggleShowA = () => setShowA(!showA); const toggleShowB = () => setShowB(!showB); return ( Bootstrap 11 mins ago Woohoo, you're reading this text in a Toast! Bootstrap 11 mins ago Woohoo, you're reading this text in a Toast! ); };
